remarks: Lemma for finite recursion.  Without assuming ~ ax-rep , we can show that the domain of the constructed function is a limit ordinal, and hence contains all the finite ordinals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem16 $p |- Lim dom recs ( F ) $.
$d F f x y $.
